item.title: Summary
item.description: Summary This cheatsheet provides a handy reference guide for writing queries using Dataview Query Language (DQL) in the dataview plugin for Obsidian.md note-taking app.

item.title: DQL Code Block
item.description: Rendered Query meta QueryType:: DQL dataCommands:: TABLE, functions:: tags:: image:: .

item.title: Text Elements
item.description: Text Elements Open a document in another pane and click it to get started. For the best experience enable ‚ÄòOpen in adjacent pane‚Äô in Excalidraw settings under ‚ÄòLinks and Transclusion‚Äô.

item.title: ‚ùì Your Questions is
item.description: ‚ùì Your Questions is Brief description of the query. ‚úÖ Reasoning for ‚õî Reasoning against üîÄ Alternatives considered üì¶ Resources Link to any relevant information üßÆ Pros and Cons calculation Provalue 0-10Convalue 0-10Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Pro110Con 110Total Pro10Total Con10 ‚ùó‚ùó‚ùó If the total divided by 100 don‚Äôt have at least 20% of difference add more Pros and Cons.

item.title: zettel
item.description: Fleeting thoughts and other miscellaneous unflied braindump items will be prefaced with ‚Äúzettel‚Äù and refactored/filed away the next time doing so seems like the most important task because i‚Äôm procrastinating on something.

item.title: dendron
item.description: tried in 2023, didn‚Äôt stick tried again in 2024 and i still don‚Äôt love it especially for digital garden #instead will use obsidian with the git#plugin Updating Dendron for GitHub Pages Deployment When attempting to update Dendron so that it updates GitHub Pages, the following sequence does not work as an appropriate next step: git commit dendron: site build Next, the following command was tried: npx dendron buildSite --stage prod followed by git commit This worked.

item.title: hardware
item.description: noteplan raycast dotfiles devon devonsphere express devonthink 3 pro bettertouchtool setapp streamdeck macbook vscode github typingmind hammerspoon alfred graph TD NP(NotePlan) --> RPN(Review Previous Day's Notes) NP --> MT(Manage Tasks) MT --> CT(Complete Tasks) MT --> CaT(Cancelled Tasks) MT --> ST(Scheduled Tasks) NP --> AD(Analog Diary) Setapp -.
